title: Leif Erikson Day, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation declaring October 9, 2025, as Leif Erikson Day. It highlights Leif Erikson's historic voyage to North America over a millennium ago, his legacy of exploration, and his impact on American history. The proclamation honors Erikson's contributions, celebrates Nordic-American heritage, and encourages Americans to commemorate the day with appropriate activities. It also emphasizes the ongoing bonds between the U.S. and Nordic nations, promoting fair trade and peace.
